name: Benny Loves You
description: Jack, a man desperate to improve his life throws away his beloved childhood plush, Benny. It's a move that has disastrous consequences when Benny springs to life with deadly intentions.

review.author: squidcakes
review.heading: Terrible, thumbs down
review.reviewBody: So disappointing, a mediocre idea with a twist and still falls flat. Painfully bad acting and massively disappointing effects, there are one or two funny scenes which were poorly executed

keywords: bear,robot,death of daughter,killing a cat,killing a dog
